title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: AI-Driven Business Decision-Making Capability Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform business scenario analysis using AI-based decision-making tools.
Learners can apply Adaptive Comparative Judgment (ACJ) theory to comparatively evaluate and analyze complex business problems.
Learners can establish self-reflection-based decision-making improvement strategies through generative AI feedback systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
